title: "SkiData"
format: html

```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(jsonlite)
library(rvest)
url <- "https://medias4.fis-ski.com/pdf/2024/CC/2257/2024CC2257RL.pdf"
h <- read_html(url)
tab <- h |> html_nodes("table")
tab
obj <- tab[[1]] |> html_table(fill = TRUE)
head(obj)
obj3 <- tab[[2]] |> html_table(fill = TRUE)
head(obj3)
```
